column1: data sources:  National Prisoners Statistics, Annual Survey of Jails
authors:  Allen J. Beck, Ph.D. and Christopher J. Mumola
Table 1.  Number of prisoners held in State or Federal prisons
Note: Jail counts for 1994-98 exclude persons supervised outside of a jail facility.
a/ Includes prisoners held in local jails because of prison crowding.
b/ Number of prison and jail inmates per 100,000 residents at yearend.
c/ The 1998 prison custody count was estimated and rounded to nearest 100.
